participant_1.background:

i like to go to the casino on weekends.
My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth.
I spend my spare time watching TV and working on my gaming startup.
I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.

I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
i am a viking.
i want to get married again.
i can t get enough of rap music , it s so good.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm looking for a new home.
Oh cool! What are you looking for in a home?
I want a home that's close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
That's awesome! I love playing tennis too.
I'm also looking for a home that's close to a school so my kids can walk to school.
That's a great idea! I'm sure your kids would love that.
I'm also looking for a home that's close to a grocery store so I can easily get my groceries.
That's a good idea! I hate having to drive far to get groceries.
I'm also looking for a home that's close to a park so my kids can play.
That's a great idea! I'm sure your kids would love that.
I think I've found the perfect home! It's close to everything I need and it's in a great neighborhood.
That's awesome! I'm so glad you found a home that you love.
Thanks! I'm excited to move in!
